Cooper Hollmaier

Hi, I'm Cooper Hollmaier. I have a passion for developing digital products that are fast, sustainable, and accessible for all.

Current projects

I support technical search engine optimization (SEO) at a large specialty outdoor retailer. When I'm not working, you'll find me writing articles, giving talks, tinkering with code and getting outside.

I often write down my thoughts about remote work, accessibility, SEO, and software engineering.
